item.title: Installation - Apache Ivy Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: To work through the tutorial, we require Apache Ivy, Ant and IvyDE, and this chapter covers installation of software. Software Version Size (approximate) Apache Ivy 2.2 1 MB Apache Ant 1.8.2 8 MB IvyDE Eclipse Plugin 8 MB Apache Ant and Apache Ivy Installation We require Apache Ant and Apache Ivy to work through the tutorial.
